text.p: Headlines from major national newspapers. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
EL PAIS
- CiU demands government invest 35 billion pesetas more in Catalonia
-UN looses track of 600,000 Hutus in Zaire
-Endesa buy offer ignores pact with electric commission
EL MUNDO
- Government and CEOE propose raising wages by just two percent in 1997
- The false kidnapping of Martin Prieto
DIARIO 16
- Feminists ask for pensions for housewives
- Where was Martin Prieto?
ABC
- Anti-terrorist cooperation and Nato reform at the centre of Spanish-Portuguese summit
CINCO DIAS
- Telefonica, in the clouds - share, at its peak, accounts for 34 percent of bourse business
- and Tabacalera, in the dumps, as possible rise of Virginia tobacca prices makes share fall 4.7 percent yesterday
EXPANSION
- Bank of Spain on "red alert" over salary rises
- Savings banks ask for lower costs on other credits
GACETA DE LOS NEGOCIOS
-CEOE askes for lower business taxes throughout Spain
-Government asks for compensation of 302 billion for Endesa
